info.name: StatsAPI
info.description: version=1.0 - Mock examples for StatsAPI GraphQL service

body.raw: {"query":"query getGamesByGameDate($startDate: String!, $endDate: String!, $timezone: Int!, $sortOrder: SortOrder, $status: [Status], $stateStatus: [StateStatus], $leagues: [StatsLeagues]) { getGamesByGameDate(startDate: $startDate, endDate: $endDate, timezone: $timezone, sortOrder: $sortOrder, status: $status, stateStatus: $stateStatus, leagues: $leagues) { away { abbreviation draws logo losses } gameDate { epoch iso8501 } gameProgress { currentPeriod displayPrimary displaySecondary } home { abbreviation draws logo losses } id name score { away home } sourceGameId } }","variables":{"startDate":"2026-02-20","endDate":"2026-02-20","timezone":-5,"sortOrder":{},"status":{},"stateStatus":{},"leagues":{}}}

{"query":"query getGamesByGameDate($startDate: String!, $endDate: String!, $timezone: Int!, $sortOrder: SortOrder, $status: [Status], $stateStatus: [StateStatus], $leagues: [StatsLeagues]) { getGamesByGameDate(startDate: $startDate, endDate: $endDate, timezone: $timezone, sortOrder: $sortOrder, status: $status, stateStatus: $stateStatus, leagues: $leagues) { away { abbreviation draws logo losses } gameDate { epoch iso8501 } gameProgress { currentPeriod displayPrimary displaySecondary } home { abbreviation draws logo losses } id name score { away home } sourceGameId } }","variables":{"startDate":"2026-02-20","endDate":"2026-02-20","timezone":-5,"sortOrder":{},"status":{},"stateStatus":{},"leagues":{}}}

{"query":"query getGamesByGameIds($gameIds: [String]!) { getGamesByGameIds(gameIds: $gameIds) { away { abbreviation draws logo losses } gameDate { epoch iso8501 } gameProgress { currentPeriod displayPrimary displaySecondary } home { abbreviation draws logo losses } id name score { away home } sourceGameId } }","variables":{"gameIds":"id-12345"}}

{"query":"query getGamesByGameIds($gameIds: [String]!) { getGamesByGameIds(gameIds: $gameIds) { away { abbreviation draws logo losses } gameDate { epoch iso8501 } gameProgress { currentPeriod displayPrimary displaySecondary } home { abbreviation draws logo losses } id name score { away home } sourceGameId } }","variables":{"gameIds":"id-12345"}}

{"query":"query getGamesBySportRadarIds($gameIds: [String]!) { getGamesBySportRadarIds(gameIds: $gameIds) { away { abbreviation draws logo losses } gameDate { epoch iso8501 } gameProgress { currentPeriod displayPrimary displaySecondary } home { abbreviation draws logo losses } id name score { away home } sourceGameId } }","variables":{"gameIds":"id-12345"}}

{"query":"query getGamesBySportRadarIds($gameIds: [String]!) { getGamesBySportRadarIds(gameIds: $gameIds) { away { abbreviation draws logo losses } gameDate { epoch iso8501 } gameProgress { currentPeriod displayPrimary displaySecondary } home { abbreviation draws logo losses } id name score { away home } sourceGameId } }","variables":{"gameIds":"id-12345"}}

{"query":"query getScores($timezone: Int!, $date: String, $league: StatsLeagues, $context: String, $locale: String, $tags: [Int], $slugs: [String]) { getScores(timezone: $timezone, date: $date, league: $league, context: $context, locale: $locale, tags: $tags, slugs: $slugs) { leagues { id league name current } gameGroups { name current } bettingLink { id success ctaText logo } hash } }","variables":{"timezone":-5,"date":"2026-02-20","league":{},"context":"Sample text content","locale":"demo-locale","tags":1,"slugs":"demo-slug-001"}}

{"query":"query getScores($timezone: Int!, $date: String, $league: StatsLeagues, $context: String, $locale: String, $tags: [Int], $slugs: [String]) { getScores(timezone: $timezone, date: $date, league: $league, context: $context, locale: $locale, tags: $tags, slugs: $slugs) { leagues { id league name current } gameGroups { name current } bettingLink { id success ctaText logo } hash } }","variables":{"timezone":-5,"date":"2026-02-20","league":{},"context":"Sample text content","locale":"demo-locale","tags":1,"slugs":"demo-slug-001"}}

body.raw: {"query":"query getStandings($permalink: String!, $season: Int) { getStandings(permalink: $permalink, season: $season) { slug tag { permalink } season name standingGroupings { title } } }","variables":{"permalink":"demo-permalink","season":2026}}

{"query":"query getStandings($permalink: String!, $season: Int) { getStandings(permalink: $permalink, season: $season) { slug tag { permalink } season name standingGroupings { title } } }","variables":{"permalink":"demo-permalink","season":2026}}

{"query":"query getGamecastBySlug($slug: String!) { getGamecastBySlug(slug: $slug) { tag { hash slug } slug scoreLeaderboard { name subName id } gameDate podium { title } raceInfo { distance distanceUnit laps name } scoreboard { gameDate } } }","variables":{"slug":"demo-slug-001"}}

body.raw: {"query":"query getSchedule($slug: String!, $timezone: Int, $season: Int) { getSchedule(slug: $slug, timezone: $timezone, season: $season) { adPlacement { adId gameRowIndex groupIndex repeatOffset } league name slug scheduleGroupings { current title } } }","variables":{"slug":"demo-slug-001","timezone":-5,"season":2026}}
